title: Google\Cloud\ContactCenterInsights\V1\IntentMatchData
name: IntentMatchData
description:
The data for an intent match.

Represents an intent match for a text segment in the conversation. A text segment can be part of a sentence, a complete sentence, or an utterance with multiple sentences.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.contactcenterinsights.v1.IntentMatchData

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.intent_unique_id
params.description: The id of the matched intent. Can be used to retrieve the corresponding intent information.

methods.description:
